level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal, see § 7008 of Fiscal Year 2010 Budget Support Second Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-207, October 15, 2009, 56 DCR 8234).
For temporary (90 day) repeal, see § 7008 of Fiscal Year Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-260, January 4, 2010, 57 DCR 345).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-17, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-441.
